content: The Act is titled the "Comprehensive Methamphetamine Abuse Reduction Act" and aims to expand prevention efforts for methamphetamine abuse. The Comprehensive Methamphetamine Abuse Reduction Act expands prevention efforts for methamphetamine abuse by allowing grants for school-based programs on the dangers of methamphetamine abuse and addiction. The Comprehensive Methamphetamine Abuse Reduction Act allows entities to implement school-based and community-based programs for methamphetamine abuse prevention using evidence-based methods. Section 464N of the Public Health Service Act is amended to allow grants for interdisciplinary research on methamphetamine abuse and addiction. The amendment to Section 464N of the Public Health Service Act allows grants for interdisciplinary research on methamphetamine abuse and addiction.
